title: Slab Serif
content:
It's a bit like Courier, with a little thick/thin going on …

Any help is greatly appreciated.

Font: 

 YD Hope (Bold) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317124153/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [world.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317124153/http:/typophile.com/files/world_1.jpg) | 29.56 KB |
author: Falani

comments.content:
It looks like the latin-subset of the Korean font **YD Hope (Bold)** by YoonDesign [1989-2012]:  
 [http://www.fonts.com/font/yoon-design/yd-hope/bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317124153/http:/www.fonts.com/font/yoon-design/yd-hope/bold "http://www.fonts.com/font/yoon-design/yd-hope/bold")

The **Haan Somang** font (also from YoonDesign) seems to have the same latin-subset but I can't find a source for it.
Wow! Great call - I reckon that's it. Thanks so much.
